name: Frictional Force Experiment - ContentsDa Science Experiment
summary: A car stadium environment, the track has a mat and a wooden sled with a dummy on top of it, the experiment is conducted from the viewing area, there are 3 bombs labeled sandpaper, glass, and OHP film, grab one of them and throw it on the mat, if it hits the mat well, the bomb will explode and the surface of the mat will change to the corresponding material, Adjust the button to gradually increase the angle of the mat, and at a certain angle, a wooden sled will roll down the sled with a human model...
